message: Questions for software developers who are in management positions in Egypt, When hiring developers in the past year, how easy was it to find full stack web developers? I've noticed most fresh grads are familiar with RoR or PHP/Laravel, is this your impression as well?

data.message:
What do you mean with full stack ? 
Usually .Net stack is around 50% of the market, and freshmen are moving towards front end more, like Angular and React.

I think you are doing it other way round, what do you need ? Or are you doing market statistics ?

Software developers? Management positions?
And since when knowledgeable people hold management positions in Egypt?
